reviewText: This is definitely one of their best one's I own. I love all of the music and the talent,my word,can they sing. "These are they" is my ultimate favorite song sung by Bill,Guy,Russ,and David. They sing this song so beautifully together. I recommend to anyone that wants to hear a diversity of songs that they can sit back and relax to then this is just that dvd to buy. Great job and God's Blessing to all who sing on this dvd....
Title: N/A

reviewText: ROCKY MOUNTAIN HOMECOMING has a pleasant beginning, and beautiful  scenery, which is panned often during the shooting. Though some songs are better than others, all the songs are good.There is something exceptionally relaxing about this DVD. The opening song has good lyrics. Gloria Gaither is a tremendous asset and a blessing to us who purchase these. Perhaps she and Bill Gaither are not always given due credit. Woody Wright's Back Home Again is really fun. Sweet Holy Spirit, by the Isaacs, is hard to describe, but wonderful to hear. "When I Wake Up in Glory" is uplifting. Jake Hess sings for us; he is so cute and funny. Gaither's love for Hess and Lester is touching, and it makes one appreciate those men, even though I did not know them and they are gone now. The music ends with "These are They," and it is a great way to end it. The quartet is Guy, David, Russ and Bill in this one.  Good job everyone, and thank you for your good work.  Mickey Thorne

reviewText: I bought this for my dad after he got too ill to be able to attend Sunday morning services.  It not only brought beautiful music to their home but humor.  It made my parents feel they were still in a community of believers.  Well worth the money.
Title: N/A

reviewText: All of these are good. But this was great owing to the fact that we have been to Red Rocks for other Christian concerts. Bill Gaither sure hit gold with this whole idea of bringing back famous gospel singers to sing popular Christian songs. My in-laws have just about all the series. Like all the others, this does not disappoint.
summary: This is especially good since we lived near Red Rocks for years.
